mapper.update: /*환불승인시 로직*/ UPDATE tb_rf_refund_completed SET refund_progress_status = '환불완료' WHERE user_id_code = #{userIdcode};
/*환불불가시 로직*/ UPDATE tb_rf_refund_completed SET refund_progress_status = '환불불가' WHERE user_id_code = #{userIdcode};
mapper.select: SELECT trrc.user_id_code as userIdCode ,trrr.order_code as orderCode ,trrr.goods_code as goodsCode ,tgg.goods_name as goodsName ,tgg.user_id_code as sellerIdCode ,tgg.goods_price as goodsPrice ,tuau.user_contact as sellerPhoneNumber ,trrc.refund_progress_status as refundProgressStatus FROM tb_rf_refund_request as trrr inner join tb_rf_refund_completed as trrc on trrr.refund_request_code = trrc.refund_request_code INNER JOIN tb_g_goods as tgg ON trrr.goods_code = tgg.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_u_all_user as tuau on tgg.user_id_code = tuau.user_id_code WHERE trrc.user_id_code = 'id012';

/*어드민페이지 환불 내역 총 들어온거 셀렉트*/ SELECT rrr.refund_request_code as refundRequestCode ,rrr.refund_request_money as refundRequestmoney ,rrr.refund_request_datetime as refundRequestDatetime ,oocs.user_id_code as userIdCode ,gg.goods_name as goodsName ,rrrr.refund_request_reason_code_name as refundRequestReasonCodeName ,rrbs.buyer_seller_consultation_refund_work_progress as buyerSellerConsultatioRefundWorkProgress FROM tb_rf_refund_request as rrr inner join tb_o_order_current_status as oocs on rrr.order_code = oocs.order_code INNER JOIN tb_g_goods as gg on oocs.goods_code = gg.goods_code INNER JOIN tb_rf_refund_request_reason as rrrr on rrr.refund_request_reason_code = rrrr.refund_request_reason_code INNER JOIN tb_rf_refund_buyer_seller_consultation_standard as rrbs on rrr.refund_buyer_seller_consultation_code = rrbs.refund_buyer_seller_consultation_code

/*환불요청시에 상품 기본정보불러오기*/ SELECT ppg.payment_code as paymentCode ,ppg.goods_code as goodsCode ,ppg.order_code as orderCode ,ppg.user_id_code as buyerId ,ppg.payment_by_cash_time as paymentByCashTime ,ppg.payment_realtime as refundRequestmoney ,gg.user_id_code as sellerId ,gg.goods_name as goodsName FROM tb_p_payment_goods as ppg inner join tb_o_order_current_status as oocs on ppg.user_id_code = oocs.user_id_code inner join tb_g_goods as gg on oocs.goods_code = gg.goods_code Where ppg.user_id_code = 'id009';

/*환불사유 선택 카테고리*/ SELECT refund_request_reason_code as refundRequestReasonCode ,refund_request_reason_code_name as refundRequestReasonCodeName ,refund_buyer_request_details as refundBuyerRequestDetails ,user_id_code as userIdCode ,refund_request_reason_registration_date as refundRequestReasonRegistrationDate ,refund_request_reason_disposal_date as refundRequestReasonDisposalDate FROM tb_rf_refund_request_reason ;
